label_hario_switch_tetsu_kasuya_step_01:
0:00 - 0:30: (Valve Open) Blooming stage
pour {firstPourInGrams}g of water, at {firstPourTemp}°C.
label_hario_switch_tetsu_kasuya_step_02:
0:30 - 1:15: (Valve Open) 1st pour
pour {secondPourInGrams}g of water (Total: {secondPourTotal}g), at {secondPourTemp}°C.
label_hario_switch_tetsu_kasuya_step_03:
1:15 - 1:45: (Valve Closed) 2nd pour
pour {thirdPourInGrams}g of water (Total: {thirdPourTotal}g), at {thirdPourTemp}°C.
label_hario_switch_tetsu_kasuya_step_04:
1:45 - 3:00: (Valve Open)
let the water flow until 3:00. Close the switch.
label_hario_switch_emi_fukahori_step_01:
0:00 - 0:30: (Valve Closed) Blooming stage
pour {firstPourWaterInGrams}g of water
label_hario_switch_emi_fukahori_step_02:
0:30 - 1:10: (Valve Open) Pouring stage
pour {secondPourWaterInGrams}g of water single continuous pour to the centre of the coffee bed
